Dive hands-on into the tools, techniques, and information for making your own analog synthesizer. If youÃ¢â‚¬â„¢re a musician or a hobbyist with experience in building electronic projects from kits or schematics, this do-it-yourself guide will walk you through the parts and schematics you need, and how to tailor them for your needs. Author Ray Wilson shares his decades of experience in synth-DIY, including the popular Music From Outer Space (MFOS) website and analog synth community.

At the end of the book, youÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ll apply everything youÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ve learned by building an analog synthesizer, using the MFOS Noise Toaster kit. With this book, youÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ll learn:
* The differences between analog and digital synthesizers
